code: import{Figure,FigureNames}from"./Figure";import{Colors}from"../Colors";import blackLogo from'../../assets/chess-figure/black-queen.png';import whiteLogo from'../../assets/chess-figure/white-queen.png';export class Queen extends Figure{constructor(color,cell){super(color,cell);this.logo=color===Colors.BLACK?blackLogo:whiteLogo;this.name=FigureNames.QUEEN;}canMove(target){if(!super.canMove(target))return false;if(this.cell.isEmptyVertical(target))return true;if(this.cell.isEmptyHorizontal(target))return true;if(this.cell.isEmptyDiagonal(target))return true;return false;}}
